title: Monster Trucks
writer: Derek Connolly, Matthew Robinson, Jonathan Aibel
short_cast: Lucas Till, Jane Levy, Barry Pepper, Thomas Lennon, Rob Lowe, Danny Glover, Amy Ryan, Holt McCallany, Frank Whaley
cast: Lucas Till, Jane Levy, Barry Pepper, Thomas Lennon, Rob Lowe, Danny Glover, Amy Ryan, Holt McCallany, Frank Whaley
